column1: # N00: reduce-wait-times - Reduce average wait time during peak hours to under 3 minutes
# N01: predictable-seating - Customers can know if seating is available before arriving
# N02: consistent-training - Standardized barista training and quality control across all locations
# N03: local-identity - Each location reflects and serves its specific neighborhood
# N06: community-gathering-space - Create third-place environments for community events and connection
# N08: operational-efficiency - Reduce labor costs while improving throughput
# N09: brand-differentiation - Stand out from Starbucks and independent shops
